main event: A very large, bright orange-red light was observed by the crew of a Pan American Airlines flight traveling from Tokyo to Honolulu.
interesting points: The light appeared stationary for 5 to 10 minutes before beginning to move erratically in different directions.
The light would suddenly disappear and then reappear nearby.
The pilot estimated the distance of the object to be 10 to 15 miles from the aircraft.
The object exhibited characteristics not normally associated with any known celestial or manmade object.
The sighting originated from a commercial airline flight crew, which is considered a reliable report.
sighted object: a very large, bright orange-red light
witnesses: crew of a Pan American Airlines flight
